title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, push models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models for chat, tools, embeddings and retrieval.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark mode, mobile).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli (go-llama)
summary: Interactive TUI for Ollama written in Go; browse, chat, and manage models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Neovim plugin that turns Ollama models into a GitHub-Copilot-like inline completion engine.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension to chat with local Ollama models inside the editor sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker image and compose samples (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama in containers.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot (milvus/ollama-rag-chatbot)
summary: End-to-end RAG template combining Ollama, Milvus vector DB and Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-llama-index
summary: LlamaIndex LLM and embedding drivers for Ollama; one-liner swap for GPT in RAG apps.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated collection of Modelfiles (Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc.) maintained by Ollama.

title: ollama-gui-framework
summary: SvelteKit-based framework for building custom web UIs on top of Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-distroless
summary: Distroless, minimal-container build of Ollama for reduced attack surface and faster pulls.
